tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RegulatoryComplianceReports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name STRING,
  report_date DATE,
  supervisor_name STRING,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    compliance_level VARCHAR(50),
    reviewer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
  compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id UUID,
  compliance_type VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES regulatory_reports(report_id)
);
